thread.section_title: DesignCrowd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DesignCrowd | designcrowd.com
thread.title: Zheng Guangzuo

author: Zheng Guangzuo
title: Zheng Guangzuo
text:
Everything is good, but please do remember one thing if you post a project: NEVER CHOOSE A DESIGN UNTIL YOU ARE FULLY SATISFIED.
The rule is: If you are very interested in one particular design, give the designer feedbacks, let him/her do better revisions. When you feel that you are fully satisfied, then you may choose the design.
After you choose a design, you get into the "project handover stage", in this stage you can still require revisions. DON'T TRUST IT. It's just useless. When you ask for revisions in this stage, you just get crap. The designer won't care about your words because he was already guaranteed to have the money. Trust me, this is my real experience.
